**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 38 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 36 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 33 [Bharlen Sajor](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1683) **Source** [Pathfinder #171: Hurricane's Howl](/Sources.aspx?ID=101) pg. 27 **Perception** +21; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20) **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +24, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +22, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +20, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +20 **Str** +5 **Dex** +7 **Con** +7 **Int** +0 **Wis** +3 **Cha** +5 **Items** _+1 [breastplate](/Armor.aspx?ID=10)_, heavy crossbow (20 bolts and 2 storm bolts [as [storm arrows](/Equipment.aspx?ID=169)]), [Trident](/Weapons.aspx?ID=45) --- **AC** 32 **Fort** +22 **Ref** +24 **Will** +18 **HP** 190 ([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42), rejuvenation) **Immunities** [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40), [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38) **Rejuvenation** ([divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) When Bharlen is destroyed, her armor rebuilds her body over the course of 1d10 days—or more quickly if the armor is worn by a living host (see [Graveknight Armor](/Monsters.aspx?ID=244)). If the body is destroyed before then, the process restarts. Bharlen can only be permanently destroyed by obliterating her armor (such as with [_disintegrate_](/Spells.aspx?ID=76)), transporting it to the [Positive Energy Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=3), or throwing it into the heart of a volcano.
**Sacrilegious Aura** ([abjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=2), [aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64)) 30 feet. When a creature in the aura uses a [positive](/Traits.aspx?ID=128) spell or ability, Bharlen automatically attempts to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) it, with a +18 counteract modifier.
**No Escape** **Trigger** A creature within Bharlen's reach moves away from her; **Effect** Bharlen Strides up to her Speed, following the foe and keeping it in reach throughout this movement. --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** _shock trident_ +24 ([Electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Shove](/Traits.aspx?ID=193)), **Damage** 3d8+11 piercing plus 1d6 electricity **Melee** fist +23 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)), **Damage** 2d6+11 bludgeoning plus 1d6 electricity and Push **Ranged** _shock heavy crossbow_ +24 ([Electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [range increment 120 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 2](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)), **Damage** 2d10+8 piercing plus 1d6 electricity **Ranged** _shock trident_ +24 ([Electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)), **Damage** 3d8+11 piercing plus 1d6 electricity **Brute Strength** Bharlen deals an extra 1d8 damage with [tridents](/Weapons.aspx?ID=45), and a trident gains the [shove](/Traits.aspx?ID=193) trait while she is using it in melee (both the extra damage die and the shove trait have been included in Bharlen's trident Strikes above). **Devastating Blast** ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65)) Bharlen unleashes crackling lightning in a 30-foot cone. Creatures in the area take 6d12 electricity damage (DC 30 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). Bharlen can use this ability once every 1d4 rounds. **Graveknight's Curse** This curse affects anyone who wears a graveknight's armor for at least 1 hour. **Saving Throw** DC 40 Will save; **Onset** 1 hour; **Stage 1** [doomed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9) and cannot remove the armor (1 day); **Stage 2** doomed 2, hampered 10, and cannot remove the armor (1 day); **Stage 3** dies and transforms into the armor's graveknight. **Ruinous Weapons** Any weapons Bharlen wields gain the effects of the _[+1](/Equipment.aspx?ID=281) [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280)_ and _[shock](/Equipment.aspx?ID=303)_ runes. **Sodden Strike** ([Conjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=33), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Water](/Traits.aspx?ID=165)) Bharlen calls to the endless storm to lend murderous power to her blows. She makes a Strike; on a hit, seawater appears in the target's lungs and the target is [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) (sickened 3 on a critical hit). **Weapon Master** Bharlen has access to the [critical specialization effects](/Rules.aspx?ID=235) of any weapon she wields.
name: Bharlen Sajor
